select id, title, (select name from sys_user u where u.user_id = c.create_user_id) userName, date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date from cahg_activity_notice c ORDER BY create_date DESC limit #{page},#{rows}

select id, title,date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, content, file_name, file_old_name, (select name from sys_user u where u.user_id = c.create_user_id) userName from cahg_activity_notice c where 1 = 1
and id = #{id}
